author: Jane Von Bergen
title: Disgruntled customer returns to the Convention Center
text:
Disgruntled customer returns to the Convention Center   5:37 PM EST 74 Share Jane M. Von Bergen Staff Writer 
Jane M. Von Bergen writes about the workplace â€” employment, unemployment, management, unions, legal issues, labor economics, benefits, work-life balance, workforce development, trends and profiles. More by Jane M. Von Bergen Feb 14 
2022 annual symposium and Congress at the Pennsylvania Convention Center, 20 years after the Cataract group vowed it would never hold another meeting at the center. 
Philadelphia Inquirer interview shortly after the group's last meeting here in 2002. The society canceled its 2008 and 2012 Philadelphia conventions.
